mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.siteid AS "siteid", a.sitecode AS "sitecode", a.sitename AS "sitename", a.workshop AS "workshop", a.hegelv AS "hegelv", a.minhegelv AS "minhegelv"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_site_hegelv( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, siteid, sitecode, sitename, workshop, hegelv, minhegelv ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{siteid}, #{sitecode}, #{sitename}, #{workshop}, #{hegelv}, #{minhegelv} )
mapper.update: UPDATE base_site_hegelv SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, siteid = #{siteid}, sitecode = #{sitecode}, sitename = #{sitename}, workshop = #{workshop}, hegelv = #{hegelv}, minhegelv = #{minhegelv} WHERE id = #{id}
